A CV (short for the Latin phrase curriculum vitae, which means “course of life”) is a detailed document highlighting your personal information. CVs typically include information like your job , age , phone number, email and your full name of your work. You may be asked to submit a CV when applying for jobs in academia or a job
If you need help determining how to write a CV, it can be helpful to consult a template. In this article, we will provide additional background on the document along with an easy-to-follow CV example template to ensure you craft a powerful curriculum vitae that stands out to employers.
